scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run-script build" "cd server && npm run-script build"
scripts.install: (cd client && npm install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 npm start" "cd server && PORT=3001 npm start"
scripts.start:prod: (cd client && npm start:prod) && (cd server && npm start:prod)
